text: is a retired Japanese professional tennis player. ==Tennis career== Maya Kidowaki represented Japan at the 1992 Summer Olympics in doubles with Kimiko Date and lost to Jana Novotná and Andrea Strnadová in the third round 6–3, 7–6(4). She also competed in the Australian Open main draw.NY Times ==WTA Finals== ===Doubles (2–0)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- ! Outcome ! No. ! Date ! Tournament ! Surface !
